Cor Draconis Devlog

Here are my biweekly devlogs for my preproduction work on Cor Draconis in Fall 2024. Here you can find detailed breakdowns of my tasks and workload. Each blog will feature a deep, personal look into my thoughts and development process. They will also contain images of finished work and hour breakdowns which show how much I have worked on in a given week and what it was on. Thank you for taking the time to read through it and I hope you enjoy!

Sprint 0 Blog

Date 09/22/24 - 10/06/24

During this sprint I completed a technical interview, met my teammates, and made this website!
